data.name: Rogue Lords - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Rogue Lords Original Soundtrack immerses you in the game's unique world.
When composing each track, Laurent Courbier worked closely with the development teams to perfectly capture the world and action of the game. Start your journey in the New World with 18 devilishly good and original tracks.
data.about_the_game:
The Rogue Lords Original Soundtrack immerses you in the game's unique world.
When composing each track, Laurent Courbier worked closely with the development teams to perfectly capture the world and action of the game. Start your journey in the New World with 18 devilishly good and original tracks.
data.short_description: Immerse yourself in the atmospheric world of Rogue Lords with the Original Soundtrack, which includes 18 tracks composed specially for the game.
